Super cloudy, with high concentrations of oats and wheat. No bittering hops were used but we loaded up on whirlpool hops at just below isomerisation temps to capture all the oils and resins of these big-hitting US & Aussie hops.
Then double dry hopped with even more hops for juicy aromas of passionfruit, mango and pineapple.
With most of the hop oils still in solution there is a perceived bitterness or “green” flavour on the back of the palette, which will mellow a week or two after kegging.
name: 12 Hayz of Xmas - Really Hazy IPA

description: Packed full of hop flavor with a lighter malt body, this American IPA showcases Citra, Centennial and Chinook hops. Citrus, Grapefruit and Passionfruit dominate the nose and tongue in this hop bomb. Brewed on a limited basis because of short supply of it's namesake hops.
name: 3C IPA

description: With all late-addition Simcoe, Citra, and Galaxy hops and even more generous dry-hopping, this dank Vermont DIPA is balanced and delicious. Dude, just trust us. It’s good. We were even going to enter it into a contest or something, but we’re not sure what happened...
name: Big 'Stoner

description: Singular 2 row malt base, simcoe & citra hops, hints of fruit with a sweet hoppy finish.
name: Hazy IPA

description: 20 different hops celebrating their 205th a
name: Hop 20

description: Golden in color, this unfiltered IPA is full of bright citrus hop aromas. Generous additions of wheat and caramel malts provide balance to the ample hop additions throughout the entire brewing process.
name: Shed India Pale Ale (IPA)

description: Buckethead IPA is like riding a bucking bull, naked. Big buckets of hops give you a bitter and bold kick in the mouth that makes you feel alive. To up the intensity, we add four types of hops that are balanced by a light caramel malt sweetness.
name: Buckethead IPA

description: Created in 1996, Harvest Ale features Cascade and Centennial hops from the Yakima Valley in Eastern Washington. These hops are harvested and shipped as “wet” un-dried hops—the same day they are picked—to our brewery in Chico where our brewers eagerly wait to get them into the brew kettle while their oils and resins are still at their peak.
name: Northern Hemisphere Harvest Wet Hop Ale

description: The grand daddy of them all. Imperial Jack - robust, malty and heavily hopped. Who said "jackrabbits" don't bite?
name: Imperial Jack Double IPA

description: India Style Pale Lagers are loosely defined and somewhat mysterious, making the style a fitting backdrop for two newly discovered hop varieties; Ella from Australia creates notes of orange peel, pine, and tropical fruits while Hallertau Blanc from Germany adds hints of floral, grassy, and herbal basil. The result is a playful and inventive hop character combined with the crispness of a lager.
name: Samuel Adams Ella Blanc IPL
Rice Rice Hazy Double Rice Ipa

description: A WISE PERSON ONCE SAID “Nothing is done until it is overdone”. We couldn’t agree more, so we took the righteousness of our SHUGGIE and big upped the NZ hops, the malt, just plain everything.
name: Mo' Shuggie Soulbender IPA

description: Citra, Mosaic, and Galaxy hopped DIPA blended with fresh pe
name: Peach DIPA

description:
This hazy IPA has a light grain base of Canadian Superior Pilsen, Wheat, Rolled Oats and Crystal for color. With this base, the hops are putting on the real show! Utilizing Chinook in the beginning of the boil, we added lots of Amarillo, Ekuanot and Simcoe Hops at the end, giving the beer strong flavors of tropical citrus, mango, pine and grapefruit.

Special Techniques: Dry-Hopped
Special Ingredients: Imperial Juice Yeast
Malts: Canadian Superior Pilsen, Wheat, Rolled Oats, Crystal 75
Hops: Chinook, Amarillo, Ekuanot, Simcoe

OG: 1.065
TG: 1.015
ABV: 6.45
IBU: 47
SRM: 9
name: Hazy Swayze IPA

description: Smoothie IPA with Guava, lactose,
name: Fruit Blood Double Smoothie IPA - Guava and Mango

description: All Galaxy h
name: All Galaxy DIPA

description:
WHO SAYS THE WORLD NEEDS ANOTHER IPA? WE STILL DO.
We definitely do not have any misgivings about revisiting our instantly memorable 2014 collaboration with Heretic Brewing Company and Beachwood Brewing. In the 2016 rebirth of this double IPA, we’ve dialed back the dankness and upped the hop intensity with a new mélange of hops (Idaho 7, Azacca and Motueka). Just like the original, its tropical fruit character, spiciness and classic American resiny, piney hop flavor hits a sweet spot in the name of all that is good, delicious, hoppy and forward-thinking.
name: 20th Anniversary Encore Series: Beachwood / Heretic / Stone Still Unapologetic IPA

description: Pat-ASK-ala? Pata-SKALA? Pa-TASK-a-la? While those in the know favor the third pronunciation, no matter how you say it, this is a unique red IPA. The beer was first brewed in September 2015 to support music and arts education programs in Pataskala, Ohio, where Stone co-founder Greg Koch grew up. People there loved it, so we added the beer to our seasonal lineup. The deep crimson hue is courtesy of a fairly new special German malt variety by BESTMALZ called Red X. Dry-hopped with Mosaic, Cascade and Amarillo hops, this beer is incredibly citrus-forward, rounded out with biscuit and toffee notes. We think you’ll find this red IPA to be quite deliciously satisfying, no matter how you choose to pronounce it.
name: Stone Pataskala Red X IPA

description: This Double IPA is right up the hop heads alley! Tangerine and grapefruit aromas that give way to a substantial bitterness that is sure to linger and not disappoint!
name: Ball Dropper DIPA

description: Blindfold blankets us in the darkness yet it maintains a surprisingly light body and bold, hoppy character. This blak IPA emerged from our Beer Camp program and builds on Sierra Nevada's legendary love of hops with roasted malts for depth and complexity. Like its namesake, Blindfold is a bit disorienting-the color of a stout and the intense, hop-forward flavors of a Classic American IPA.
name: Blindfold

description: Session IPA with Apollo, Azacca, Citra, Jarryl
name: Forever Ever
Ruination Double IPA 2.0 W/ Blackberries, Strawberries And Lemon Peel

description: You will have no moves left after drinking this hazy DIPA. Motueka, Rakau and Wai-iti hops for the win!
name: Checkmate DIPA

description: Bursting with tropical aromas and juicy fruit flavors from Mosaic and Amarillo hops, this golden IPA is perfectly bitter with a refreshing, sublime finish.
name: Voodoo Ranger IPA

description: Super Foxy is brewed with twice the malted barley as Swamp Fox IPA, and dry hopped with Centennial, Simcoe and Galaxy hops. Tons of pine, grapefruit, and passion fruit flavor and aroma. Be careful with Super Foxy, she is a deceiving seductress.
name: Super Foxy Double IPA

description: The latest in our Annex IPA Series! Juicy-hazy-lush, jam packed with flavors of mango, apricot, grapefruit, and resinous pine. Easy on the bitterness but not on the haze!
name: Annex IPA Series No. 13 (She Drives Me Hazy)

description: При производстве пива, использовался хмель Relax и Vic Secret, во вкусах которых присутствуют оттенки зеленого чая, лимонной травы, дыни, ананаса, клубники, цветущей яблони, тропических фруктов, цитрусов.
name: Double Jack DIPA

description: Single-hopped with Galaxy, Galaxy & more Galaxy. Then double dry-hopped with Galaxy.
name: Super Galaxy Sasquatch

description: A Double IPA based on Half Cycle IPA, Winter Cycle is a big hop bomb featuring 8 different hops from 3 continents. Piney Juniper berries with hints of citrus add a subtle winter kick. Now in 12 oz cans.
name: Winter Cycle Double IPA

description:
Originally a Wild Dog release commemorating our 10th anniversary. Double Dog Double Pale Ale became here to stay in 2009. Could you control such a beast?

This is a big beer that calls for equally big foods. Flavor notes: Citrus hops with sweet malt and subtle alcohol burn (like a kiss on the cheek) Pairs with: Extra sharp aged Cheddar and stinky Blue cheese; smoked brisket; spicy foods with chili or cayenne pepper; earthy desserts like carrot cake.
name: Double Dog

description: Our first IPA brewed and packaged at our new facility in Canton, MA. El Dorado, Citra, and Columbus hops create a blast of citrus zest, pineapple, wet earth, and woody aromatics. The flavor brings a pithy bitterness and just a touch of toasted malt. Medium bodied with a dry, minerally finish.
name: Scaled

description: NE IPA hopped solely with Huell M
name: Huell Melon Hazy IPA

description: Limit
name: La Vache Folle: Simcoe Double IPA

description: An assertive and hoppy west coast-style India Pale Ale. Bright hop aromas and flavors fade to a brief, smooth malt undertone and a clean, crisp, slightly bitter finish. This beer is brewed to bite you back!
name: Green Head IPA

description: Hazy body, mango, papaya, smoo
name: Double Crush

description: Very sweet, alm
name: Galactic Nova Double IPA

description: Double IPA for
name: Double Secret Probation

description: Vermont
name: Haze Flux

description: Our mamas always taught us that you can never be too polite. In their honor, we decided to test that theory with the Too Kind. It has everything you love from the Kind IPA but jacked up to an out-of-this-world level. A hop exuberance of pine, citrus and love that plays nice with others. Hops: Horizon, Cascade, Meridian, Centennial and double dry hopped with Mosaic and Falconers Flight!
name: Too Kind DIPA (2018)

description:
Hoptopia is Hermitage Brewing Company’s flagship IPA. This amber colored beer has a great aroma that is a mixture of piney, citrus, and floral hop notes. This hop forward beer has a piney hop flavor, mixed in with some grapefruit-like character, and balanced by a toasted malt flavor with hints of caramel. Hoptopia is a well balanced IPA that is remarkably approachable and easy drinking.

**This beer has no affiliation with Hoptopia.com or the Hoptopia iPhone and Android apps.**
name: Hoptopia

description: Dark Copper in color, sweet nose and piney hop
name: Double IPA

description: A Double India Pale Ale. The hops used in this brew make it very fruity and make for a full-bodied and flavourful, yet pleasing, easy-drinking beer. But with 9% alcohol, it’s also a very strong beer – definitely made for sipping! Production in 2014: 41 hl.
name: D.I.P.A.

description: Part of our continuing Fox, Wolf and Dragon IPA series, ? is a 6.7% IPA featuring Styrian Fox hops.
name: Fox Hazy IPA

description: Hopheads rejoice! Our first lupulin powder beer!!!!!...Not to take away from the excitement about the lupulin powder, but this is also our very first recipe from Assistant Brewer Ben Baumann...and we must say, Ben killed it! Dog Beach is absolutely packed with Mosaic aroma. Enthusiastically hopped with El Dorado and Mosaic, Dog Beach presents a firm but approachable bitterness thanks to some tricky water chemistry and enough malt sweetness to balance the massive IBUs. Finished in the fermenter with a lion's share of Mosaic lupulin powder using a technique from our new Brewmaster, this beer got an aroma boost from prominent to intense. Limited release, so drink it fresh while you can. If you love everything IPA, this is not one that you will want to miss.
name: Dog Beach DIPA

description: This beer has a unique floral aroma from the generous addition of Cascade hops to the fermenter in a procedure known as dry hopping.
name: Flagship IPA

description: Brewed in the style of an American Double IPA in celebration of our 10th anniversary. This beer is golden in color, has medium to full body, intense hop bitterness, flavor and aroma. Ten additions of American hops are made throughout the brewing process.
name: X-Double IPA (10th Anniversary Ale)

description: Lovely but light New Eng
name: Sky Pig Hazy IPA

description: Hops
name: Hazy Dave

description: The big wide world inspires our imagination and fuels our passions. Anything from music, film, beer, literature, architecture, food, engineering, poetry…all art forms essentially, including more beer. We steal with any and all things that possess the one value that we hold most dear: authenticity. The important thing of course is that ‘It’s not where you take things from – it’s where you take them to.’ So, what are we saying about this beer, exactly? We gave it our take. We took all there is to love about the IPA, got creative, dry-hopped it a lot, left it unfiltered and shared it openly in the hopes that in some way it may, in turn, inspire you. Hail to The Hop Thief, an original.
name: Stone 21st Anniversary Hail To the Hop Thief Double IPA

description: Thick and juicy fresh! Brewed with oats, milk sugar, and ripe mangoes. Heavily hopped with Citra, Idaho 7, Mosaic & Galaxy.
name: The Big Fat Juicy: Mango Milkshake DIPA

description: Piney at the nose, Creeker is by no means an ordinary double IPA. Creeker is all hops with little malt body. Enjoy the intense citrus flavor with tropical notes, floral aroma & full body moutfhfeel.
name: Creeker

description: Rye has been a staple grain for millennia—sought after for its stubborn resilience in the field and revered for its unique flavor. Ruthless Rye IPA is brewed with rustic grains for refined flavors, combining the peppery spice of rye and the bright citrusy flavors of whole-cone hops to create a complex ale for the tumultuous transition to spring.
name: Ruthless Rye IPA

description: Bright, clean, an
name: IPA

description: É uma cerveja forte e escura do estilo India Pale Ale. Com 6,5% de teor alcoólico nossa IPA apresenta coloração âmbar, é brilhante e exibe um denso creme. Aroma floral, cítrico e frutado. É refrescante, mostrando notas condimentadas e o característico amargor do estilo.
name: IPA

description: AH GOOD ‘OL FULL-STACK. So smooth, tropical, citrusy, just such a friendly IIPA. Well, no more – we gave it our DDH treatment for a mega-assault of what you loved about this brew in the first place.
name: Double Dry-Hopped Full Stack IIPA

description: Limited Release Double IPA brewed with loads of southern hemisphere hops. This is a big, bold IPA with coconut, mango and especially white grape flavors from the hop profile and notes of peach and nectarine courtesy of house yeast blend. A puffy mouthfeel is provided by the flaked oats added.
name: Southern Hemisphere Double IPA

description: This beer is a collaborative effort between the Hellbent Brewing Crew and the Brewers of Matchless Brewing Company. Brewed with malted two row barley, malted white wheat, and corn. This beer features a newer hop called Strata which has multiple fruit aromas like mango, melon, papaya, and citrus. It is also hopped and double dry-hopped with Citra, Mosaic, and Meridian.
name: Match Made In Hell(bent) Hazy IPA

description: Notes of mango, tangerne and melon that slowly dissipate into a soft
name: Hazy Skies IPA

description: Headway IPA is brewed with four varieties of American hops. Headway blends these hop varieties in the kettle and in the dry hopping stages to allow these varietals to be bright and expressive.
name: Headway IPA

description: Prepare to embark on a collision course of Lowcountry and tropical, destined for ripe dankness. With a hefty dose of guava purée, Lo-Tropico Double IPA wouldn’t be complete without two substantial dry-hop additions of Galaxy and Mosaic Lupulin Powder.
name: Lo-Tropico DIPA W/ Mosaic Lupulin Powder & Guava

description: Hazy IPA dry hopped with Mosaic
name: Day Dreamer Hazy IPA

description:
This Year’s hop growing season is upon us! Green Shoots Double IPA pays respect to the wonderful flower that we all crave. Given the absurd amount used in this beer, we wish for another great growing season so that we may continue producing great hop-forward beers.

Green Shoots Double IPA uses a simple grain bill to allow the complex layers of hops to shine through. Finishing at 8.6% ABV, this beer has a great malt presence with a dry finish. Duly dosed with dry hops, provides a great citrus and tropical flavor and aroma. El Dorado hops are used as the second dry hop to produce a candy-like stone fruit flavor.
name: Green Shoots DIPA

description: sparked up with simcoe and citra hops, buzzing with hints of passionfruit, gooseberry, pineapple, pine, and maybe even a bit of that stuff your crazy uncle grows in his basement. best enjoyed with friends. pass it around
name: Downtown Dank

description: 5 hop varieties and a healthy dose of British and German specialty malts create this big, red, hoppy double IPA. Juicy hop aromas and flavors of citrus and tropical fruit are balanced by a medium/dry sweetness just enough to round out the assertive bitter finish.
name: Naked Twister Imperial Red

description: In your hands, you are holding yet another hop monster of a beer brewed in San Diego County. Yes, we know this is hardly original. But, we love hops as much as you do so let's party! This beer oozes hop oils, aromas and flavors. We hope it's a worthy addition to the riche that is the Port Brewing family of beers. We look forward to this annual release each May and hope you will too.
name: Anniversary Ale

description: This beer was brewed to honor the republic of Cascadia. A place filled with douglas firs, beautiful arrays of citrus-flavored hops and many friends as this was a place we once called home. This double IPA is made with three kinds of hops, three kinds of malts, and all kinds of love.
name: Cascadia Double IPA

description: White Sand Imperial India Pale Ale is the light colored twin of Black Sand Imperial India Pale Ale. Use of malts much lighter in roast allows the profound addition of summit, cascade, amarillo and other rare finishing hops to be clearly accentuated. This is a crisp and floral IPA.
name: White Sand IIPA
Unfiltered Double Dry Hopped Imperial IPA

description: Double Dry Hopped with Citra. An Imperial IPA fermented with Belgian yeast. This is a delicious beer where old school yeast meets new world hops! A mild Belgian ale, the ester profile is intentionally restricted, showcasing the best attributes of citra hops. Floral/citrus aroma are dominant and compliment the Belgian yeast character.
name: Belgian Double IPA

description: Hazy, delicious, soft mouthfeel. 6 hops: Citra, Centennial, Magnum, Sim
name: USDA Organic Double Hazy IPA

description: New England style IPA, unfiltered and brewed with 8 different hops and d
name: Hazy 8 IPA

description: Brewed with heavy amounts of fresh sweet pumpkin purée, fluffy malted oats and red wheat. Hopped and dry hopped with Citra and Mosaic. Conditioned atop Madagascar vanilla beans, fresh ginger, Ceylon black tea, cinnamon sticks, and cloves.
name: Milkshake IPA (Double Pumpkin Chai Latte)

description: Forged in the bowels of the Meadville bayou, this IPA ushers your soul down a twisted journey on the 7 C's. This Voodoo brew will insight your dark side and open a portal to your hoppier senses. The 7 C's alchemic concoction of 7 different hop varieties starting with the letter "C" conjures your taste buds into a piney-citrus paradise fit for a Hoodoo doctor. You'll love the spell this beer casts on you from the first sip
name: Hoodoo

description: Mystery Cloud Hazy IPA is inspired the trendy from New England style IPAs with a bit of West Coast influence. The IPA is described as being super juicy, soft and fluffy IPA is loaded with citra, simcoe and crystal hops creating citrusy, tropical and dank deliciousness.
name: Mystery Cloud Hazy IPA

description: Bitter American Style Imperial IPA that packs a large amount of grapefruit and piney resin, an important malt presence that helps to balance the high level of hops.
name: 1000 IBU

description: The name sort of says it all. A remarkably hoppy yet balanced and malty ale. It's not quite a barleywine and not quite a double or imperial IPA.
name: New Crustacean Barleywineish Imperial IPA Sorta

description: A goldon colored hoppy american IPA/Pale Ale with complex hopping using primarily Amarillo & Columbus, dry hopped with Simcoe hops.
name: Hazy Session IPA

description: Our juicy grapefruit beer with spirit and strength. This crazy delicious IPA combines zests of citrus and malty, toasted caramel with robust ruby-red grapefruit aromas. The result is on IPA with bold body and tart citrus savor. This tangy Grapefruit IPA is, daringly delicious, with gusto to spare. Your gullet will thank us later.
name: Hops & Robbers Grapefruit IPA

description:
After over a year of prototyping R&D batches of Nu Skool IPA, this final version is one special beer. It’s an approachable, well-balanced IPA with slight malty sweetness that’s brimming with tropical, fruity, spicy, piney & citrus character. To contrast our IPA (brewed since 2002), which most closely resembles a traditional English IPA in malt & hop bills, we wanted to brew an IPA in a new way. Like craft brewers, hop farmers have come a long way. This beer showcases just how far we’ve come with alluring aromas & explosive flavors using only new American & experimental hops. There’s no need to add anything else. It’s time to graduate to the next level of hop flavors with Nu Skool IPA.

HOP PROCESS: We used 3.5 lbs. of “new school” varieties of hops per barrel of beer. We load our hopback to the brim with Mosaic hops for a big tropical fruit character. A nice whirlpool dose of experimental hop #07270 gives the beer a flavorful, resinous character. We then dry hop this beer on two separate days with a large amount of Mosaic hops in our hop cannon & Simcoe + Equinox two days later.
name: Nu Skool IPA

description:
One day, Doc decided to double the hops while brewing, so the team, of course, followed along and added even more! Loaded with Chinook & Cascade hops, we created this smooth sipping double IPA that turned into a favorite for everyone! In honor of Doc, we’ve kept this double whammy of a brew in our line-up for all to enjoy.
Suggested Pairings: mixed greens salad piled high with veggies, blue cheese, olive oil & vinegar; Swedish meatballs with gravy; Crab cakes with chipotle aioli & fresh squeezed lemon.
name: Doc's Double Whammy IPA

description: A deliciously intense and fruity unfiltered IPA featuring Mo
name: Mo' Hazy IPA

description: Welcome to the world of bright, citrus and tropical fruit forward IPA’s. This divinely hoppy brew will pour a hazy golden color with a big white head. Aromas of lemon peel, tangerine, and passion fruit come through on the nose with some dank undertones. The flavor profile begins with an intense hop bitterness that is complimented by slightly sweet, caramel malt in the finish. *UNFILTERED*
name: Citra Splendor DIPA

description: Double IPA. Jam packed with 7 lbs per barrel of Mosaic, Citra, Hartbeat is triple dry hopped monster of an 8.4% DIPA.
name: Hartbeat

description: DIPA w/ Citra, Blanc,
name: Shoulder Lean

description:
Falling Waters Trail is an awe inspiring hike that takes hikers to some of the most beautiful water falls in our area. It's also the inspiration for our new Double IPA.

Made of a combination of El Dorado and Belma hops, this beer dances on the palate and delights the senses from aroma to finish.
name: Falling Waters Double IPA

description: Hazy golden with white foam. Bursting with aromas of mango, pineapple, lychee, citrus and fresh cut grass. The flavors follow the aroma, with a touch of honey and malt to balance out this hop bomb. Citra and Mosaic hops blend to create a thick juicy mouthfeel without lingering bitterness
name: Hip Hops

description: Hazy double IPA brewed with Ella, Enigma, Idaho 7 & Mosaic hops. This beer is an absolute tropical fruit salad of Peach, Melon, Grapefruit, Mango, Tangerine, Passion Fruit, White Wine & Pineapple with a beautiful underlying pine and dank character. Brewed to commemorate the retirement of Kobe Bryant aka The Black Mamba’s number 24 jersey.
name: Mamba Mode DIPA

description:
The wet hops in this beer were picked from the best lots of hops in the Yakima Valley in Washington and rushed back to Winters, CA, where they were thrown directly into this beer! A one-of-a-kind experience for a one-of-a-kind beer.

Your first tasted of this DIPA is filled with a bright aromatic bouquet of lemon, citrus and pine. Balanced with a soft-finished bitterness, a clean mouthfeel that resembles a clean green tasteful watermelon rind flavor.
name: 3-Farm Simcoe Wet Hop DIPA

description: Even more abundant with citrusy, fruity loopy-like hop aroma and flavor, this idiosyncratic Double India Pale Ale is deep orange in color and presents with a pleasantly soft mouthfeel. This is beautiful. What is that, Velvet?
name: Juice Deuce – UnCut Double New England Style IPA

description: Issue de la Série Road Trip, la Double IPA est notre deuxième bière embouteillée. Son houblonnage à froid lui confère une complexité florale d’une grande finesse.
name: Serie Road Trip - Double IPA Simcoe

description: INU HAZY IPA Simcoe + Vic Secret +
name: INU HAZY IPA Simcoe + Vic Secret + El Dorado

description: New Zealand and Lancaster collide in Southern Cross Hog 2X IPA, our latest Brewer’s Reserve release. We took our Big Hog down under, with three unique southern hemisphere hops, for notes of tropical fruit, citrus and a brawny punch of pure hop love.
name: Southern Cross Hog

description: smooth malt backbone, and some mild alcohol warmth, this bold DIPA packs a punch (at practically 10%) and coats your tongue with an intense, yet pleasant bitterness. K. Sutra has intense tropical, citus, pine, and melon
name: K. Sutra DIPA

description: An India Pale Ale we brewed with coastal spirit. This hop crasher sharply dives into the very deep waters of bitter beers.
name: Vallejo

description: Introducing Hop Stimulator, an IPA we've dosed with so much hops that drinking one is downright transformative. Resinous alpha and beta acids intertwine with a muscular all-malt body to create a beer that's so bold, it's... it’s... MONSTROUS!
name: Hop Stimulator

description: Our favorite aromatic and bittering hops deliver a fragrant citrus aroma and snappy hop character to this eminently quaffable IPA.
name: India Pale Ale

description: For beer lovers who stretch beyond the 12th fret, our well balanced RYE IPA strums with an obvious bouquet of grapefruit, tangerine and orange harmonies. For hop enthusiasts of all varieties, this headliner gets folks asking for encores daily.
name: Cutaway Rye IPA

description: A juicy, easy drinking Northeastern style double IPA brewed with warrior, mosaic and citra hops.
name: Northeastern DIPA

description: This hazy fresh hop IPA was steeped on 200 pounds of fresh Sabro and Loral hops. Tropical lime and coconut notes throughout.
name: Hazy Fresh Hop IPA (Sabro & Loral 2018)

description: Presenting hop aroma and flavor of fresh grapefruit and resinous pine, Watershed IPA strikes a balance between bitter and sweet, finishing crisp and clean.
name: Watershed IPA

description: Brewed with oats, wheat, and lactose. Dry-hopped heavily with Southern Cross hops for a citrus and piney aroma.
name: Hazy IPA

description:
Brewed with a NEIPA yeast, mango puree and tons of Citra hops.
Not a NEIPA per say, with a little more bitterness and a drier finish.
name: Sky High Hazy IPA

description: Our newest Double IPA showcases one of our favorite hops: Citra. A big, bitter, dank ale that is dominated by the citrus flavors of Citra. The use of Chinook, Amarillo and Simcoe in this ale were no match for the Citra Brute. Citra Must be Destroyed!
name: Citra Must Be Destroyed

description:
By definition, an India Pale Ale is hoppier and higher in alcohol than its little brother, pale ale — and we deliver in spades. Now one of the most well respected and best-selling IPAs in the country, this golden beauty explodes with citrusy flavor and hop aromas, all perfectly balanced by a subtle malt character.

This crisp, extra hoppy brew is hugely refreshing on a hot day, but will always deliver no matter when you choose to drink it.

Hops: Magnum, Chinook & Centennial
name: Stone IPA

description: A unique blend of American hops and Belgian yeast create a nice and complex IPA with a low bitterness, spice and fruit forward profile and a smooth dry finish.
name: Canada Goose Hazy White IPA

description: This beer is the essence of Southern California. A traditional west coast IPA with a distinct copper hue, enhanced by generous additions of navel oranges, sweet blood oranges and grapefruit, all grown in Redlands, CA. The citrus flavors and aromas intensify the zesty cascade and zythos hops to deliver a one-of-a-kind drinking experience. An invigorating beer with a pleasant, defining bitterness, perfect for warm weather.
name: Orange Wedge Double IPA

description: The gnomes of Fairyland may be little, but they have big, very big, personalities. HOUBLON CHOUFFE matches their impish spirits. All gnomes, with their innate good taste, are in full agreement about HOUBLON CHOUFFE, which is flavoured by three different types of hops. This India Pale Ale is appreciated for its pronounced bitterness combined with the fruity tones of traditional Achouffe beers: it softens the strongest of characters.
name: Houblon Chouffe

description: Hazy IPA brewed and dry hopped with Galaxy, Azacca, Mosaic, and Citra. Soft on the palate, with huge tropical fruit notes.
name: Confidential Informant #20 Hazy IPA

description:
This New England style IPA has a pronounced malt presence matched with an intense hops component, amplified by the Super Lemon Haze inspired terpene. With pleasant bitterness,
it rounds out with a slightly sweet, clean malt end note.
name: Ghost Bog Hazy IPA

description: A mighty hop lover's dream, Hop Rising adds malty backbone to an intense imperial IPA. This insanely smooth, dry-hopped ale has everything: 9% ABV and 72 IBUs.
name: Hop Rising

description: Juicy and fruity Ipa relies on less traditional ingredients when it comes to this newest hazy IPA. Some lighter caramel malts and the addition of Lemondrop and Jarrylo hops gives this hazy a unique flavor and aroma
name: Freak Flag Hazy Ipa

description:
2014 Beer Camp Across America Release.

As ever, San Diego’s Ballast Point looked to the sea for the inspiration behind Electric Ray. A play on the fish’s scientific name—Torpedo californica—this beer pays homage to our mutual home state, as well as to our Hop Torpedo, the source of much of the big flavor in this high voltage, hop-forward Imperial Pale Lager.

Ballast Point brought their homebrewing dreams to the big leagues and started brewing professionally, but they never forgot their roots. They still run a successful homebrewing supply shop in San Diego. A love for hops and the ocean inspire incredible brewed and distilled offerings, and their one-of-a-kind labels boast some beautiful, and sometimes gnarly-lookin’, fish.
name: Electric Ray

description:
In 2011 Harpoon co-founders Rich Doyle and Dan Kenary brewed a Rye IPA as part of the brewery’s 100 Barrel Series. It quickly became a favorite at the brewery, so we decided to make it year-round.

This beer is brewed with our proprietary yeast – the same yeast we’ve used since first brewing Harpoon Ale – and some interesting hop varieties. The combination of Pale, Rye, Caramel 60, Flaked Rye, and Vienna yield a complex malt body that stands up to the spiciness of the rye and the pronounced hop flavor. The rye also adds a reddish hue to the beer. The kettle additions of Centennial, Apollo, and Chinook, and the dry hop addition of Falconer’s Flight add a multidimensional hop character.
name: Harpoon Rich & Dan's Rye IPA

description: Previously sold as "DIPA Pi
name: Wasteland Double IPA

description:
Stratus clouds are the classic Seattle clouds - overcast as far as the eye can see. Summer’s over and gone, over and gone - you know it is. That slight chill in the morning. It’s dark by 830 again. You’re a Seattleite. You tell everyone you like the sunny weather, but the first day it’s overcast with a little bit of rain, you’re going to smile.

Let all the transplants whine on facebook about how our nine months of winter is back. You’re going to enjoy watching the rain replenish the earth, looking at the patterns of clouds, sipping on this double hazy IPA.

This hazy is predominantly hopped with Citra - you’re going to get nice hits of tropical fruit flavor in this one. Most hazy IPAs get their haze from an addition of wheat to the grain bill. This one’s haziness is all hop oils, though.
name: Stratus Hazy Double IPA

description: Hopheads rejoice! Citraholic is a "modern" West Coast IPA that's focused on Citra, one of our favorite new American hop varieties. Brewed with an abundance of Citra hops, we also blend in Warrior, Columbus, and Simcoe in the kettle for good measure. Citraholic is double dry hopped for two weeks with an abundance of Citra (and a touch of Columbus) imparting heavy aromas of citrus & tropical fruits with melon and gooseberry nuances. A base of American 2-row malt and scatterings of light British caramel malt create the perfect foundation for this unique and powerfully pungent IPA. You asked for it and we were happy to deliver!
name: Citraholic

description:
Nimbus Hazy IPA
6.3% ABV

Man. Fall’s really here, isn’t it? I mean, it’s not cold yet, but it sure looks cold. Luckily, you can sit inside (or under the awning on the patio), and watch those nimbus clouds drop their rain, while you sip on a Nimbus hazy IPA. Hazy gold in appearance, aromas of blueberry, mango, & citrus. Tastes of mango, peach, & mandarin. Dry, clean & minerally finish.
name: Nimbus Hazy IPA

description: To Celebrate Yard House's 22nd Anniversary, Stone Brewing in collaboration with Aviation American Gin brings you Liquid Compass Double IPA. Now you can enjoy everything you love about a flavorful beer and a smooth gin in one single sip. Uniquely brewed using the same botanicals as Aviation Gin, Liquid Compass emulates the same New World profile as the popular gin. Sweet orange peel, whole juniper berries and coriander seeds are added to the beer post-fermentation. These combined with the citrus and tropical hop character give the beer an intense citrus flavor, with an emphasis on orange notes. The finish is sweet and malty with massive hop and botanical character.
name: Liquid Compass Double IPA

description:
This IPA is an exciting beer with a floral in aroma and an incredible hop flavor. The maltiness is increased (over a regular pale ale) to help balance the aggressive hop usage. This contributes to the higher alcohol content as well.
When India was part of the British Empire, pale ale shipped to the troops would often spoil due to the rough voyage and temperature extremes. The brewers had a theory that if they loaded the beer with extra hops, the hops would preserve the beer. Of course, this added significantly to the beerâ€™s flavor and aroma. When the troops returned to Britain, they had become \hop-heads\"
name: Hoppy Trails IPA

description: An abundance of American hops balanced with a hint of malt to produce an exhilarating experience of intense hop flavors and aromas of citrus, floral and resin that combine to provide a satisfying crisp finish.
name: Rip Cord Double IPA®

description: Une double IPA puissante et audacieuse, aux arômes de fruits exotiques. Cette bombe rafraîchissante à l'amertume explosive est produite en quantité limitée pour en préserver la fraîcheur!
name: Simple Malt Bomba

description: Blackcurrant, pine and citrus on the nose give way to a resinous, grapefruit-tart body with a lingering bitterness. Heavy on the hops, and at 8.5% it packs a punch and delivers on its promise of double deliciousness.
name: Double IPA

description: Here at Mikkeller we are proud to present the newest addition to the Mikkeller selection – the Mosaic Double IPA. Poured with a white head this clear amber coloured beer has a nice aroma of pineapple, citrus fruits and crispy hops.
name: Mosaic

description: Single hop DIPA brewed and dry hopped with Mo
name: Double Mosaic

description: Welcome Sunshine and Spring! Our New England style Double IPA is a fresh and fruity celebration to the sunny lifestyle!
name: Sunshine Double IPA

description:
A group of hop-heads and publicans challenged our Beer Camp brewers to push the extremes of whole-cone hop brewing. The result is this: a 100 IBU, whole-cone hurricane of flavor. Simply put —Hoptimum: the biggest whole-cone IPA we have ever produced. Aggressively hopped, dry-hopped, AND torpedoed with our exclusive new hop varieties for ultra-intense flavors and aromas.

Resinous “new-school” and exclusive hop varieties carry the bold and aromatic nose. The flavor follows the aroma with layers of aggressive hoppiness, featuring notes of grapefruit rind, rose, lilac, cedar, and tropical fruit—all culminating in a dry and lasting finish.
name: Hoptimum

description: A Mangifera é uma Indian Pale Ale de cor âmbar com leve turbidez e espum
name: Mangifera

description: Death by Hops IPA was the winner of Olde Hickory's first Pro-Am (2010). The beer was designed by Alex Buerckholtz, award winner homebrewer and proprietor of Hops and Vines in Asheville, NC. Brewed with 2 row barley, hopped with 5 different west coast hops, then twice dry hopped.
name: Death By Hops

description: A refreshing drink often associated with childhood nostalgia to others a pop-cultural symbol of emancipation. Whatever the association we teamed up with good old Swedes, Henok and Karl of the fashionable Omnipollo to squeeze out a tasty, tempting and deceivingly well balanced IPA with sweet and sour notes of old-fashioned memories. Perhaps you can taste the dishonesty, it's all over your breath -it's Lemonade.
name: Old Fashioned Lemonade IPA

description: This IPA is a blend of mosaic and citra hops to give it a pleasant citrus aroma and flavor.
name: Confidential Informant #12 Dry Hopped DIPA

description:
Meeting the Equilibrium guys at Hop City, our hop forward festival back in March, was one of the highlights of our year (their dancing at the after party will live long in our memory), as was the beer we made together - Infinity Vortex! It was great to welcome Will and Pete back to Leeds in October to get our brew on once again, and if it ain’t broke...

We decided straight away to brew another big double IPA; this time showcasing the brewhouse’s favourite hops in the form of Mosaic and Citra. We then paired that time-honoured duo with the underrated El Dorado variety and the classic citrus and pine notes from Simcoe lurking underneath. Expect a riot of tropical fruit flavours over a classic, smooth New England base packed with wheat and oats.
name: Patrons Project 3.06 // Double IPA // James Butler // A Whale of Two Cities // Equilibrium

description: An IPA with raspberries and blackberries from the Commonwealth of Virginia. Collaboration with Ardent Craft Ales, Hardywood Park Craft Brewery and Governor of Virginia, Terry McAuliffe.
name: Give Me IPA Or Give Me Death

description: Juicy
name: Hazy IPA

description: A high alcohol, robust pale ale dripping with hop flavor and aroma. English malts and hops are used to create a truly unique double IPA. Hop character is floral and slightly spicy, backed up by a rich malt profile. Not for the faint of heart.
name: Double IPA

description: Hazy version of the galactic space dragon witn mango, rasberry and pr
name: Juice Bar Galactic Space Dragon Hazy Ipa

description: Our Double IPA! We smell a ton of peach on the nose, with complimentary notes of orange and passionfruit. The flavor is similar with a blast of citrus fruit & peach quickly followed by a bounty of tropical fruit. A lingering and pleasant saturated hop oil finish awaits. . . . A real juice bomb of a beer!
name: Haze

description: Ontdek ons 100% biologische Gulpener Ur-Hop. Een ongefilterd, eigenzinnig speciaalbier van lage gisting. Gebrouwen volgens de unieke brouwtechniek ‘dry hopping’. Bij dit ‘drooghoppen’ voegen we de hop pas een week na het brouwproces toe om het hoparoma te verhogen. Zo ruik je de heerlijke geur van verse hopbellen en geniet je volop van de zo karakteristieke vol bittere smaak. Honderd procent (h)eerlijk! Gulpener Ur-Hop is goed te combineren met lichte, frisse en licht bittere gerechten, gegrilde kip en salades met rucola.
name: Gulpener Ur-Hop

description:
Hops, hops, and more hops describe this bold Double IPA. Beginning with a strong but clean malt backbone we built the hops off of our love for, well, hops. Look for light fruit, resin, pine, with a wisp of spice. The aroma and flavor will change as the beer warms up to also reveal mint, pineapple, and citrus.

Proceeds from the sales of this Double IPA will go to Ales for ALS education and research.

Bronze Medal Winner – Raise a Glass International Beer Competition 2016
name: Ales For ALS DIPA

description: This is our Hazy Valley New England Style IPA finished off with a touch of mango and pineapple to give it a crjsp, tropical kick. Just in time for Indian Summer!
name: Hippy Hill Hazy Ipa

description: A hazy beer for those long lazy and hazy days of summer. A subtle nose of tropical goodness brimming with mango and a touch of pineapple. Smooth and short finish with a satiating quality.
name: Hazy Days of Summer IPA

description:
DIPA with floral, citrus and pine notes, with an underlying dankness.

Malts: Barley, Oats
Hops: Columbus, HBC431, Simcoe, Loral, Huell Melon
name: Beer + Art Series 2018 06 DIPA

description: Cutting Tiles is an exploratory series of Double IPA's featuring a range of aromatic single hop varietals brewed with raw wildflower honey. This new version is dosed with 100% Citra in all kettle, whirlpool and two massive dry hop additions. The local wildflower honey keeps the body light and drinkable but provides a earthy backbone. Floral and zesty up front backed up with a nuanced citrus character on the nose that continues straight through in the flavor profile. Pillowy soft mouthfeel, with a restrained bitterness on the finish.
name: Citra Cutting Tiles

description: At 8% Wolf Will Sneak up on you from behind the robust citrus and dank earthy hop notes mirrored in its aroma and flavor profile.
name: Wolf Among Weeds

description: This juicy IPA flaunts intense tropical fruit aromas & a balanced citrus finish. Late addition hops give this beer its full flavor without crazy bitterness.
name: Double Dry Hopped Citra IPA

description: New Zealand Double India Pale Ale
name: DIPA

description: Golden Promise malt with Citra, Amarillo, and Si
name: Supajuice

description:
Hopwired was one of the first, true new world IPAs made exclusively with unique NZ hops. In its short life time it has become a modern classic among Kiwi craft beers. Since then, many other IPAs have emerged but we dare say this is still somewhat the benchmark.

Although there is plenty of malt sweetness, this beer is all about the hops. Punchy, aggressive, New Zealand hops that all add up to create wonderful, tropical flavours and aromas. Wine people would talk about waves of passionfruit, limes, tangelos & gooseberries. Luckily we don't have to go to such detail, so you can just enjoy it without further complication.

Cheers!
name: HopWired I.P.A.

description: Brewed in the New England Style, this hazy IPA is unfiltered and made with late addition hops to bring lots of flavor and aroma, but without the bite of the traditional American Style West Coast IPA. Hazy Angel is made with El Dorado and Citra hops giving it notes of tropical fruit flavor and aroma.
name: Hazy Angel IPA

description: A mix of 4 hops along with flaked oats and red wheat make this IPA juicy
name: Dirt Church Hazy IPA

description:
7:45 AM. Your friends have all gone home and the barkeeper is kicking you out because you’re the last one at the bar... again. But you just won’t stop partying! We dedicate this beer to you – always the last one standing long after we have all fallen into our beds. You are the hero of the night!

Hops: Columbus, Simcoe, Amarillo, Chinook
Malt: Pilsener, Munich, Crystal
name: 7:45 Escalation

description: A rip current of fruity flavors swirling with mango, berries, and citrus fruits bound together in a silky creamy haze.
name: Hazy Harbor Ipa

description: A collaboration IPA with Siren Craft Brew using lactose, our hazy IPA strain, and coffee from Kuma Coffee.
name: Home from Home

description: We’re proud to introduce our first ever hazy New England IPA juice-bomb! Not the bitter, piney IPA of the old days, but a soft and luscious creation dripping with pineapple and grapefruit juice flavors extracted from Citra and Denali hops. $1 from every purchase supports the Cape Fear Raptor Center in rehabilitating injured birds of prey.
name: Falconer's Flight Hazy IPA

description:
Outburst is a refreshingly bitter Imperial IPA. With 80 IBUs and 8.5% ABV, our dry-hopped Imperial IPA delivers a bold taste with a massive hop flavor.

Malts:
2-Row Pale Barley, Munich, Caramel & CaraRed

Hops:
Nugget, Chinook & Centennial

Dry Hopped With:
Simcoe & Centennial
name: Outburst Imperial IPA

description:
The battle to the last, the maximum of the efforts, the limit of possibilities - that's what Bitter End. Double dry hopped on different stages of fermentations with Galaxy, Mosaic, Citra & El Dorado.

With this beer we would like to support everyone who is suffering from its own difficulties, tired and does not see more ways and opportunities. Never Give Up. You are not alone, talk about it, fight, we are on your side.
name: Bitter End - DDH DIPA
I Always Felt Closer To IPAs Than I Did To People

description: Hoppy, unfiltered IPA with a strong, d
name: Hazy IPA

description:
Pineapple Express
A double IPA conditioned on 42lbs of pineapple per barrel. Late kettle and dry hop additions leave a smooth yet hoppy character and a touch of lactose brings everything together.
name: Pineapple Express DIPA
Color Block Hazy IPA W/Vanilla & Orange Zest

description: Double driwd hopped
name: DDH DIPA

description: Malgré ses caractéristiques extrêmes, la double IPA se pare d’un bel équilibre en bouche. D’une belle robe rougeâtre, ses notes maltées balancent à merveille les doses massives de houblon et le côté épicé du myrique beaumier, à la fois amer et rappelant un peu le pain d’épices.
name: Ale Amérindienne - Double IPA au Myrique Baumier

description: Hip Hop Double IPA is gemaakt op basis van 100% Munich mout. Hierdoor krijgt het bier zijn prachtige kleur en moutig aroma. Galena hop brengt een stevige bitterheid die typisch voor een Amerikaanse IPA maar minder gekend in Belgische bieren. De bitterheid is zeer hoog en blijft lange tijd nasmaken. Dryhopping met Centennial en Cascade hoppen brengt een bloemig en citrus aroma.
name: Hip Hop Double IPA

description: Three of our Island hop farms dove into the whirlpool to bring you this highly hopped, fresh and fruity IPA. Off Island hops for the Triple Dry Hop; Amarillo, Azacca and Mosaic
name: Three Farms Hazy IPA

description: Clean, crisp and refreshing. A tribute to our friends at Indie Hops, this amazingly balanced beer is bursting with the finest hops Oregon has to offer: Nugget, Centennial, Meridian, Crystal and Horizon.
name: Worthy IPA

description: Classic San Diego style DIPA with loads of fruity and tropical hops emitting aromas and flavors akin to over-ripe cantalope, mango, orange marmalade, and papaya.
name: Batch 1

description: Cross Hare Double IPA takes over where our Hare Trigger IPA stops. With a deep amber malt profile and a formidable hopping cycle, Cross Hare is an intense beer, not to be taken lightly!
name: Cross Hare

description: Hazy IPA with a bright sweet lemon and hop resin aroma and flavor. Low b
name: It's In the Pleats Hazy IPA

description: A full-bodied, American-Style I.P.A. that is bronze in color, Castaway IPA is "dry hopped" (aged with liberal amounts of whole hop flowers after fermentation) for assertive hop flavor and aroma. The bitterness is balanced by the malty body of the beer.
name: Castaway IPA

description: What you have here is a serious India Pale Ale shacking up and hunkering down with mango and apricots. At the same time! Romantic Chemistry is brewed with an intermingling of mangos, apricots and ginger, and then dry-hopped with three varieties of hops to deliver a tropical fruit aroma and a hop-forward finish. It’s fruity, it’s hoppy, it’s tasty!
name: Romantic Chemistry

description: The Holy Grail for hopheads! Clocking in at 15-20% ABV, 120 Minute IPA is continuously hopped with a copius amount of high-alpha American hops throughout the boil and whirlpool, and then dry-hopped with another pallet of hops. Unfiltered and abundently hoppy.
name: 120 Minute IPA

description: Sim
name: Simcoe Double IPA

description:
GABF 2012 Bronze, 2015 Silver in the English-style IPA category.
Monumental® IPA is a rich copper color, and is intensely hoppy. We add a special blend of American hops throughout the brewing and fermentation process to create a complex combination of aroma and flavor. This ale exhibits floral notes, flavors of citrus and resin, combined with delicious caramel background notes. Our IPA's perfectly balanced style will keep the palate fresh and invite the drinker back into the glass.
name: Monumental® IPA

description: Galaxy, Simcoe, and Az
name: Opaque Hazy Session IPA (Batch #4)

description: Fuggles is a single-hopped, dry, crisp ale that is wonderfully balanced and deceptively smooth.
name: Fuggles IPA

description: Perrin IPA accomplishes the nearly impossible feat of balancing a sweet malty backbone along with a blend of west coast hops, along with Michigan Cascade hops. Which creates a crisp bitterness and imparts massive floral and citrus aromas. This is how an IPA should taste!
name: 98 Problems IPA

description: Our 100% Citra hopped IPA. Citrus forward with a clipped, cle
name: Murren River

description: AIN’T HE? Backing that up is a smooth easy drinking IPA that is all tropical citrus that is in the pocket anytime.
name: Charlie's Good Tonight DDH IPA

description: This one-time brew was created for the Hank Shaw Sausage & Bee
name: Cedar Tip Hazy IPA

description: Our pet octopus is a bit of a jerk. He’s that guy who has a couple then either tells you how much he loves you or threatens to fight you. So we brewed this IPA, with 8 varieties of hops and 8 types of malt. We targeted 88 IBU and 8.8% to appease him. Sadly, when he found out that we’d fabricated all of the above info, it only made him more volatile. We are starting to realize that Octopus was a poor choice for a pet.
name: Octopus Wants To Fight IPA

description: Pineapple, Coconu
name: Slice of Pina Colada Milkshake DIPA

description: Trop
name: Mir Hazy Double IPA

description: The IPA is brewed with Pale and CaraFoam malts and Naked Golden Oats to yield a rich copper color and smooth mouthfeel. We minimized the specialty malts in this brew to allow the star of the show, the hops, specifically Mosaic, to be showcased properly. Using Warrior as our primary bittering hop and additions of Mosaic and Zythos in the brewkettle and whirlpool we created a crisp intense bitterness and layers of earthy and herbal flavors. Finally, we dry hopped this unique IPA with Mosaic once again to lock in and enhance the aromas of tropical fruit, citrus and fresh pine.
name: Mosaic-Hero

description: We doubled down on Head Stash IPA; more malt, more hops, more abv and double dry-hopped to boot.
name: Dub Stash DIPA

description: This big, west coast style Imperial IPA is packed to the brim with hop flavor. Grapefruit and pine aromas with a firm bitterness make this beer a total knock out.
name: Sucker Punch Double IPA

description: IPA with lactose, pineapple an
name: IPA Kolata

description: This batch of Hazy IPA was generously dry hopped with Michigan Copper and Lemondrop hops, providing a citrus aroma and refreshing lemony flavor. Hazy IPA is a juicy beer that pours a cloudy, pale golden color with a soft mouthfeel and low bitterness.
name: Hazy IPA (Michigan Copper & Lemondrop)

description: The Alehouse Fog Series includes several American and New England style IPAs all brewed with oats, wheat, and house-made oat milk. These cloudy IPAs will all have a cloud-like mouth feel, and will feature a just a touch of sweetness.
name: Fog Series

description: Harness IPA celebrates the tethered teamwork and balance that typifies the deployment of a harness. Brewed to be bold and flavorful, Harness IPA supports an enormous hop load with an anchored malt bill of oats, rye and malted barley. Climbing gear is not necessary to enjoy this beer!
name: Harness IPA

description: Flagraiser IPA is a big, hoppy tribute to the unfurling of the Grand Union flag atop Prospect Hill in Somerville, MA on January 1, 1776. This ale celebrates our passion for hop aroma and flavor balanced with just the right amount of malt. Huge aroma and resin-y flavors from the elusive Galaxy hops are the signature of this beer. Built on a solid base of pale malts, this double IPA makes generous use of hops from Columbus, Crystal and Galaxy with the Galaxy hops taking the lead during ten days of aggressive dry-hopping.
name: Flagraiser IPA

description: INU HAZY IPA Vic Secre
name: INU HAZY IPA Vic Secret + Galaxy

description:
We kept the malt bill light to allow the hops to shine through. We dosed this sucker with a boatload of Amarillo Hop Hash. Pungent with floral, tropical citrus fruit flavors, and the hop hash gives it that one of a kind chewy, gooey, resiny mouthfeel. As the chaser, we are giving it a hefty dry hop to enhance the potent aromas. Ahtanum gives it orange and grapefruit tones, Crystal for a little kick of spiciness, and El Dorado bringing some pear and watermelon characteristics.

Malts: Maris Otter, Pilsner, Wheat, Midnight Wheat
Hops: Bravo, Amarillo Hop Hash
Dry Hops: Ahtanum, El Dorado, Crystal

KEEP ON KEEPIN' ON
name: Hop Hash Easy IPA

description:
A traditional India Pale Ale, the Elissa IPA is very hoppy with a properly balanced malty body. Elissa has huge hop additions in the kettle that give it a wonderful bitterness and is then dry-hopped in the fermenter to create the pleasant floral, hoppy nose. Our reverse osmosis water makes the bitter very soft with no harsh notes to it. The maltiness is derived from British Maris Otter malt. Its rich flavor stands up to the hops that would otherwise dominate this beer. The Elissa is an authentic version of an India Pale Ale (IPA) style.

Silver Medal, Great American Beer Festival, Extra Special Bitter or Strong Bitter, 2010
Silver Medal, World Beer Cup, International IPA, 2008
name: Elissa IPA

description: Brewed with pilsner, rye, and flaked oats. Hopped with Amarillo and Centennial. Balanced bitterness, malt sweetness, and piney flavors.
name: 608' DIPA

description: Our first double IPA! Weighing in at a whopping 8.2%. Dry-hopped with a cost prohibitive amount of Citra & El Dorado! SO. JUICY. Drink this beer as soon as humanly possible.
name: DIPA w/ Citra & El Dorado

description:
Tropical aromas of Passion fruit, Orange
and Guava dominate the nose while a big
juicy hop flavor and smooth bitterness
complement the balance of the beer.
name: Luau Krunkles

description: Collbaoration between Sierra Nevada and Buron Burgers. The result is a deliciously crisp hop-bomb, full of juicy peach flavours, with a clean finish.
name: Hazy Peach IPA
Dorado With Key Lime And Tangerine

description: A Double IPA… Juice is the time, is the place, is the motion. Juice is the way you are feeling!! A hazy sunshine juicebomb resonating with deep mango, papaya and pineapple crush. Hopped to excess with Citra, Mosaic, Simcoe in T90/Lupulin Powder blend. It's got groove… it's got meaning.
name: Sticky Bud DIPA

description: Welcome to our birthday bash! As our gift to you, we've brewed this crisp and easy drinking session IPA-full of whole hop flavor-for you to enjoy all night long. So put this bottle to your lips and start shakin' what your mama gave you-the party is just getting started.
name: Anniversary 19 Session IPA

description: Savant IPA :: Savant Just Knows It's a Great Beer. Without knowing quite why, Savant IPA knows a lot. It knows that it's built on Northwest 2-row malt, with touches of Munich, Cara-red and C-120 Crystal. It knows that it weighs in at around 6.3% alcohol by volume, that it's bittered with Northwest Chinook and finished with fruit-juicy New Zealand Nelson Sauvin hops. It knows that it'll be back as the first Manic IPA from Elysian Brewing in the new year of 2014, available in 22-ounce bottles and on draft. It knows that 22 ounces is the same as a touch over 650 milliliters (and 13012 drops for anyone who's counting), but what it mainly knows is that it's a great beer.
name: Savant IPA

description: A full malt body with hop bitterness and crisp, refreshing taste. A well balanced, bright, citrusy I.P.A.
name: Singapore IPA

description: Brewmaster Matt Brynildson went to the mountain and returned with a vision for a different kind of Session IPA, one that would be brewed and dry hopped with a globetrotting selection of new hop varieties from Europe, New Zealand and North America. He foresaw a beer that would deliver massive hop aromas, a signature malt balance and an empty glass before you knew what hit you. And so the newest member of our Jack IPA family was born.
name: Easy Jack

description: Another contract brew for T
name: Boatswain Double IPA

description: Hazy IPA brewed with Oats and Lactose. Brewed with Orange Peel
name: Endless Summer Hazy IPA

description: Brewed primarily with Denali hops that are packed with pineapple and Citrus flora. We rounded out the hops with Ekuanot, Simcoe, and Citra. This Hazy IPA is soft, slightly bitter, and crushable.
name: Mountain Juice Hazy IPA

description: The beer on board the Mayflower shared this trait. Mayflower IPA puts a descendant’s twist on this style, with a powerful hop profile balanced by plenty of malt character. We use the freshest hops from the Pacific Northwest to give this beer its distinct, piney flavor and delightful, fruity aroma.
name: IPA

description:
This American IPA has a balanced hop bitterness. Notes of citrus. This IPA will satisfy any hopheads craving.

Note: The Juke Joint recipe was updated in Fall of 2016.

Brewed with Mosaic and Amarillo hops.
name: Juke Joint IPA

description: This is full of body and flavor, yet a bit mild for for an Imperial, therefore opening it up for the more finicky of IPA trailblazers.
name: Tampa Bay Beer Week Double IPA

description: Mother’s India Pale Ale is aggressively hopped in both the wort kettle and aging vessel for a sharp, clean bitterness and fragrant citrus hop flavors. We've instilled a mellow malt character as the backbone to balance the elevated alcohol and hop levels IPA lovers crave.
name: Lil' Helper

description: An American India Pale Ale with firm bitterness and intense citrusy hop aromas. Made with 2-row pale ale malt and dry hopped with Simcoe, Cascade, Summit and more for the full experience of an American IPA.
name: Missile IPA

description:
Tea leafed IPA.

When the team behind the Great Australian Beer SpecTAPular asked us to create a special beer for their 2012 festival, we started by searching for musical inspiration from their Australian homeland. The tunes lead us on a wild conceptual ride but we ended up settling on this hugely floral India Pale Ale that is "dry-leafed" with a massive load of Earl Grey tea.  

Gunnamatta - the instrumental opening track of Paul Kelly's 2004 album Ways and Means -refers to a beach break on Victoria's Mornington Peninsula and had us thinking of good friends, cups of tea, surf, beer and rock 'n' roll!

As Paul Kelly says himself: "Remember, swim between the flags."
name: Gunnamatta

description: A Golden Rye IPA. An outstanding hop from New Zealand, Nelson Sauvin, is generously used throughout the brewing and dry-hopping of this unique beer. European rye is added for a smooth, malty addition to flavor.
name: Nelson

description: Bitter and juicy double IPA loaded with El Do
name: El Dorado DIPA

description: Inspired by West Coast I.P.A.'s, but brewed with Michigan style. The Crooked Tree is heavily dry hopped to give it a big aroma of pine and citrus. The flavors are big, yet very balanced between fresh hops and malt. Often described as \grapefruit\" our hops give this beer an excellent fruit flavor that finishes dry
name: Crooked Tree IPA

description:
Cerveja Clara Forte Tipo Double IPA. Feita com os lúpulos Columbus, Amarillo, Cascade e Simcoe.

Ela proporciona mais amargor e mais malte que uma IPA normal. Amarelo dourado, espuma branca de bolhas finas. Aroma que remete ao pinho e a frutas cítricas como o maracujá. Corpo médio, maltada e com lúpulo persistente.

Premiação:
2017 - Medalha de Bronze - Internacional Beer Challenge 2017
name: American Double IPA

description: This IPA was brewed with wheat, flaked oats, and malted oats and heavily hopped with HBC 342, Callista, Citra and Mosaic cryo hops. Fermented with an East Coast yeast strain, this beer has a smooth, creamy mouthfeel balanced by big, bright tropical fruit and citrus flavors.
name: Hazy Like a Fox

description: Munich malt, 4 different hops and grapefruit peel combine to create this IPA featuring a classic burnt orange color with a bouquet of citrus, peach and tropical fruits.
name: Citrus Mistress IPA

description: Brewed in collaboration with our friends (and masters of the IPA style) from WeldWerks Brewing Company in Greeley, Colorado, Hazy IPA represents the first New England Style IPA released by Boulevard Brewing Company. Exchanging upfront bitterness for massive hop additions at the end of the boil and in dry-hopping, we’ve created a juicy, hazy IPA bursting with tropical fruit flavors and aromas of nectary citrus.
name: Hazy IPA

description:
La Double IPA est une évolution plus houblonnée de l’IPA classique. Ses notes de
houblons et le corps y sont nettement plus intenses. Sa structure est également
plus maltée avec un taux d’alcool de 8,9°. Nous utilisons des houblons américains
tels que le Chinook, le Willamette et l’Amarillo.
name: Page 24 - Double IPA Black Edition

description: Even bigger citrusy IPA brewed with
name: Double Gunpowder IPA

description: Double IPA brewed with chili pepper, dry hops: Mosaic, Eldor
name: Chili DIPA

description:
Inspired by Paul Revere’s midnight ride, we rebelled against the British style IPA, embraced the more aggressive American version and then recast it in bold, brave, defiant black. Our Black IPA is a Declaration of Independence from the tyranny of the expected.

Back in Black is our newest year-round beer available now in six pack cans and on draft. Brewed like an American IPA but with the addition of rich, dark malts, this beer has all the flavor and hop character you expect with a smooth, mellow finish.

Bittering Hops Columbus
Flavor Hops. Columbus, Centennial
Yeast. Top Fermenting Ale Yeast
Malts. Rahr Pale Malt, Crystal 45L, Munich, De-Bittered Black
name: Back in Black

description: A Hazy India Pale Ale dry hopped with Mosaic, Idaho 7, Azacca, & El Dorado. Double Dry Hopping developed aromatic notes of pineapple, tangerine, citrus & tropical fruit with a lingering subtle earthy bitterness.
name: MH2: Hazy India Pale Ale

description: NE Style, Citra, mosaic
name: AZ Pure Water DIPA

description: A double I.P.A collaboration brew with Wild Weather Ales. Hopped with Mosaic, Ekuanot & Galaxy hops, delivering a massive hit of blueberry and stone fruits. Very easy drinking for its ABV.
name: DIPA Lo Docus

description: Hazy session, new england style, u
name: Black Doubt Opaque Hazy Session Ipa (batch #5)

description:
An India Pale Ale kicked up a notch to form a true Double IPA: feverishly hoppy with a malty backbone and higher-than-standard alcohol content. Citrusy hops tease the senses with aromatics and lingering bitterness, while just the right balance of malts disguises 2XIPA’s extra gravity.
In 2016, we took this world-class double IPA and made it perfect by increasing its Simcoe dry hop by 150%. Double your expectations, this is an ale that demands reverence.
name: 2XIPA

description: Massive additions of Citra, Ella and fresh lemon zest in tank add notes of tropical fruit and lemon sherbet to this juicy, highly drinkable Double IPA. Our collaboration with Hop Burns & Black for London Beer City's Battle of the Beer Shops!
name: 55|05 - Double IPA - Citra & Ella

description: This beer was inspired by both East and West coast IPAs. Drawing its dank piney hop character from the West, and its smooth light bitterness, along with its dry crushabilty from the East, Vine Shine combines both styles to make a truly unique IPA.
name: Vine Shine

description: Let's be crazy and just get hazy with the Next Phaze in the IPA craze! Citra and Mosaic hops will make your taste buds pop, the tropical notes and flavors don't stop, and a Medusa dry-hop will make your jaw drop. A full mouthfeel is for real in this Hazy IPA deal. Take a step back and enjoy the flavorful attack of this old school meets new school track.
name: Next Phaze Hazy IPA

description: Mouthwatering with tropical notes of papaya, grapefruit and honeydew. Gentle bitterness with subtle earthy notes of pine and black tea balanced with sweet aromatics
name: Backspin Hazy IPA

description: Gaia is our interpretation of a West-Coast I.P.A. An amber colored beer with the focus on resiny, piney hop varieties (Cascade, Columbus, Chinook, Centennial and a bit of Amarillo).
name: Gaia

description: Hazy IPA brewed with Idaho 7, Mosaic, and Distilled Centennia
name: The Schnauz-Wazzle Hazy IPA

description: Bone dry and ultra hoppy Double IPA. Brewed with 80% more hops than our already extremely hoppy HopWired IPA. Will be launched at the Annual Westcoast IPA Challenge at the Malthose in Wellington on Thursday July 14th 2011.
name: Super Conductor

description: Bière voilée forte en alcool et en saveurs, cette double india pale ale de style New England multiplie les arômes fruités d'agrumes.
name: L'Arlequin Double IPA Des Migrateurs
Hawaiian Haze - High 5 Hazy IPA With Pineapple

description:
For our latest limited edition beer, we sourced rare hop hash - a super concentrated hop resin - from Crosby Hops in Oregon, USA.

To allow the intense tropical hop flavours to shine, we used a simple malt bill of Pale Ale and Oats - for this Double IPA, it really is all about the hops.
name: Limited Edition No. 12 - Hop Hash DIPA

description: Rather than mourning our death as a contract brewer, we choose to celebrate our rebirth with Shmaltz’s first-ever black IPA, brewed with 7 malts, 7 hops and 7% abv. Savor this rich, jet black IPA - overflowing with characteristics of coffee, dark chocolate, and fresh citrus. Deep roasted malt flavors provide support for a bold mix of bright and bitter West Coast hops. We promise, this is one form of Death you’ll want to seek out.
name: Death Hoppy Black Ale

description: DIPA with mango and kiwi. Served on nitro as Ma
name: Raglan T-Rex (Mangosaurus) Imperial IPA

description: A balanced Western North Carolina IPA with bright citrus and tropical fruit aromas. Expect big grapefruit, tangerine and subtle melon flavors from the chorus of Mosaic & Centennial hops to balance out the malt in this dank & drinkable ale.
name: Hi-Pitch Mosaic IPA

description: 日本向け限
name: NE Hazy IPA

description: This double IPA brings notes of grapefruit, melon and h
name: Voodoo Hop Drop DIPA

description: Kicking back and relaxing with a session beer requires little more than a couch, some free time, and a few pals. Slow Ride Session IPA is up for this easy-going challenge, starting with a pour of sheened gold and plenty of fluffy, white foam. A blend of seven hop varieties, led by exotic Mosaic and Nelson Sauvin, twist together brilliant tropical scents of melon, peach, lime and grapefruit for a vividly fruity aroma. The flavor mirrors the aroma, while balancing a malty-sweet yet clean start and hoppy bitterness in the back. Light bodied and extra quaffable, Slow Ride Session IPA brings the finish line to you.
name: Slow Ride

description: Brewed with malted wheat, oats, lactose and vanilla. Conditioned on Blackberry, Boysenberry, Blueberry and Cranberry purees.
name: Gelato DIPA Berry Blast

description: Bask in the head’s floral bouquet. Relish citrus accents from dry hopping. Sweet, yet balanced, with a finish that never turns too bitter.
name: Centennial IPA

description: This smooth and creamy milkshake-style IPA is brewed with Ekuanot, Denali, Comet, Citra, and Cascade hops, malted barley, oats and lactose. A touch of natural vanilla.
name: Malted Milkshake IPA

description: The long, cold nights of winter are a little brighter with Celebration Ale. Wonderfully robust and rich, Celebration Ale is dry-hopped for a lively, intense aroma. Brewed especially for the holidays, it is perfect for a festive gathering or for a quiet evening at home.
name: Celebration Fresh Hop IPA

description: The long, cold nights of winter are a little brighter with Celebration Ale. Wonderfully robust and rich, Celebration Ale is dry-hopped for a lively, intense aroma. Brewed especially for the holidays, it is perfect for a festive gathering or for a quiet evening at home.
name: Celebration Fresh Hop IPA (2018)

description: Our Imperial/Double India Pale Ale combines a mixture of American and British malts with copious amounts of Apollo, Bravo and Cascade for a floral nose. The rich caramel taste offsets the bitterness while retaining a bright piney/citrusy flavor. “Couple Three” is a local colloquialism, used here in jest to describe the extremely robust hop bill.
name: Double Couple Three Hops

description:
MASSIVELY hopped with Magnum, Centennial, Nelson Sauvin,
Simcoe and Mosaic! Its hop flavor and aroma borders on OBSCENE!
A bright orange color with a HIGHLY noticeable hop aroma
and a bright citrusy hop flavor!
name: Lupulin Suplex Double IPA

description: Fantasyland – Noun; a place or circumstance existing only in the imagination or as an ideal; dream world. Origin – Midwest “Coast” of the United States. Need we say more?!
name: Fantasyland

description: Diesel Double IPA é o novo combustível da Cervejaria Capa Preta criado para os amantes de lúpulo! Uma receita explosiva com 80 IBU e 8,5% de álcool que vai acelerar os hop heads mais exigentes!
name: Diesel Double IPA

description: Dipa with citra and galaxy hops. Huge notes of citrus and tropic
name: BH DIPA

description: You think you know good IPA? We do too, and this one’s it. This is a straightforward, full-throttle, American IPA—nothing fancy here; just hop flavor and lots of it. Its hazy blonde malt body has just enough heft to carry the citrus and floral hop notes straight to your palate making Know Good perfect for today, or any day. When it comes to IPA, we know what good is.
name: Know Good IPA

description:
This one-off Double IPA showcases Citra, a popular hop variety that is renowned for its ability to produce powerful tropical fruit and citrus flavours. Thick body and sweetness provide the platform for notes of ripe mango, tangy passion fruit and juicy tangerine to sing, backed up by light resinous hop accents.

ALC 8% VOL 440ML

Aroma & Flavour: Ripe mango, passion fruit and tangerine, with a light, sweet malt profile
Body: Full-bodied, smooth and juicy
Aftertaste: Soft, sweet mango and juicy tangerine, very low bitterness

ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS
name: A•W18 One-Off DIPA V3

description: You can run, but you can't hide from the hops in this true Northwest IPA brewed by Hop Lovers for Hop Lovers.
name: Alphadelic IPA

description:
7 Fjell Ulriken Double IPA er en dobbel IPA som kombinerer kraft og friskhet. Ølet er et overflødighetshorn av amerikansk humle, med innslag av både gran, sitrus og tropiske toner av pasjonsfrukt og fersken. En tørr og bitter avslutning balanseres av et behagelig maltpreg som lar humlen stå i fokus.
Serveringstemperatur: 8-10 °C

Nytes best:
Til krydret mat
Til orientalske retter
Ved humleabstinens
name: Ulriken Double IPA

description: In the 1960s, before Vail Village was paved and closed to vehicles, "hookiebobbing" referred to those committed fools who, while on skis, grabbed onto the bumper of passing cars to tow them up to the lifts. Our IPA is a Colorado approach to the American take of an English classic. Three aggressive yet floral American hops and one hop from Down Under team together to make a bright, citrusy and floral India Pale Ale. A deep caramel malt helps to balance the bitterness of the hops and lets the complex hop bill shine.
name: Hookiebobb IPA

description: Block Party is a double IPA that brings a bit of the old school bitterness to the new school haze. Amarillo, Chinook, Columbus, Simcoe, and Cryo Citra give this beer an explosive tropical and dank aroma with some lingering grain on the finish.
name: Block Party Hazy Double IPA

description:
Hazy Session IPA Brewed with Strawberry, Vanilla, and Super Juicy American and German Hops.

But I'd Have to Charge
Damn Right this is an Insane Beverage
Your Taste Buds are Waiting la-la la-la la.
name: I Can Teach You

description:
This DIPA features a 20g/L dry hop of Azzaca, Motueka and Galaxy.

Juicy - Soft - Complex - Intense
name: DIPA

description: This deeply juicy stunner in the mold of City of the Sun and Booming Rollers will be replacing Aurora in the seasonal line-up next year. While our beloved red rye IPA will undoubtedly be missed, we think you’ll agree with our decision once you get a face-full of this outrageously tasty IPA. Brewed with Denali, Ekuanot, Citra, and Centennial hops, Critical Band is a blast wave of pineapple, papaya, and pink grapefruit over a crisp, restrained malt bill, before wrapping up in a soft, round finish that leaves you with warm feelings and an intense desire for another sip.
name: Critical Band

description: Named for Pako (say “PACO”) the dog (No wait, Pako’s not a dog!) This full flavored, fully hop-evident IPA will have the hopheads rejoicing. Explosive hop aroma from a pungent Simcoe/columbus blend.
name: Pako's IPA

description: Mosaic hops naturally give off aromas of guava and mango, lending a unique sweetness to the hop character of this pale ale. To build upon the tropical attributes of the hops, we've added a healthy dose of mango. Mango Mosaic Pale Ale is a well-balanced montage of fruit flavors, fresh aromas, and refreshingly crisp goodness.
name: Mango Mosaic

description: Session IPA. Pale golden color with soft lemon and melon esters and a bready malt body. Dry hopped with Centennial and experimental hops from the Yakima Valley. If you like a hoppy IPA, but don't always care for the higher alcohol, try an El Conquistador XPA.
name: El Conquistador

description: A simple two-row base malt with a healthy dose of Chinook, Simcoe, and C
name: Double IPA

description: This double IPA is BIG! It is brewed in the Pacific Northwest style that includes copious amounts of Pilgrim, Styrian, and Cascade Hops. It is dry hopped with ample amounts of Simcoe and Cascade hops that will send you into hop nirvana. Enjoy this Doubleback Double IPA on a fall day with full flavored foods and goods friends!
name: Outta Focus Double IPA

description: New England Imperial IPA Double Dry Hopped Juice Bomb - Burst of Citra Aroma Hoppyness - Mango Pineapple.
name: Newtonian

description: The name says it all. Named after a local mountain bike trail, this India Pale Ale has a large malt character and a huge hop profile. We Dry hop this beer with Simcoe and Amarillo hops to give it that great floral aroma and citrus finish. If you like India Pale Ale you'll find this one Just Outstanding.
name: Just Outstanding IPA

description: The Mandala series is designed to highlight single hop varietals. These double IPAs are exclusively hopped with an individual hop strand, each batch allowing both the brewer & consumers to fully taste and smell all the pure hop character. We have released many different Mandalas including; Citra, Galaxy, Zythos, Simcoe, Motueka, and Columbus. More will surface in the future, but grab ’em fresh when you see them!
name: Mandala Single Hop Imperial IPA

description: Two-row malt and Falconer's Flight hops make for a delicious tropical-fruit hop-bomb.
name: All Falc'd Up

description: A brand new recipe unfiltered IPA with oats & wheat, and a fruity aromatic trip of mosaic, citra, and centennial hops.
name: Hazy Bison IPA

description: Brewed with Columbus, Chinook, Willamette, and Azacca hops. Dank and Tropical. This IPA isn’t brewed to wreck your palette – It’s brewed with long days and never ending shifts in mind.
name: Don't Call Me Radio IPA

description: Caram
name: Yard Series DIPA

description: Hopothermia features features Nugget and Apollo provide a green, floral aroma and citrus hop base. Dry hopping with Amarillo, Citra and Centennial hops adds notes of spicy grapefruit and orange to compliment the resilient full malt body. This is an intense yet drinkable Double IPA
name: Hopothermia

description:
Dragonship DIPA - 8% ABV - IBU 75
A total rethink of the Double IPA. Brewed with our Norwegian Voss Yeast at warm temperatures and excessively triple dry-hopped with Zythos, El Dorado, and Azacca to deliver huge tropical fruit flavor and aroma. Medium body and heavy haze.

Inspired by Legendary Viking Explorer Leif Erikson who navigated his Dragonship across the northern Atlantic to be the first adventurer to land in the Americas. "Leif The Lucky's" dragon-carved ship and other longships in Viking lore were the key tools in making the Old Norse men such prolific explorers. Our use of the resilient Norwegian Voss yeast is an ode to the rough and tough Viking culture and their seafaring vessels.
name: Dragonship DIPA

description: Even though we are huge suckers for those soft, hazy, juice bursting, tropical fruit dripping IPA's, there will be always place in our hearts for good old West Coast style IPA's. This one is our vision of the style - dank, resinous, piney and with decent amount of that grapefruit pithy bitterness that dries it all up and makes you wanna drink more. This one is brewed with Topaz, Centennial, Columbus and Cascade hops.
name: West Coast DIPA

description: NEW ENGLAND IPA 5MG CB
name: CBD Hazy Ipa

description: The ultimate suburban brew, Backyahd is an aggressively hopped American IPA with a tantalizing hop aroma. The beer’s bitterness pairs perfectly with spicy foods coming straight off the grill. Enjoy it with friends, family, or whomever you choose. After all, it’s your Backyahd.
name: Backyahd

description: Brewed with a "rock-and-roll" combination of Citra, Amarillo, and Simcoe. Anchored by a sturdy malt foundation - this beer drinks dangerously easier than the ABV may suggest!
name: Whole Lotta Lupulin Double IPA

description: We ceremoniously slaughtered heaps of crimson-fleshed “Moro” fruit to retrieve its delicious ichor, and then blended it with caramel malts and grapefruity hops to produce the sticky, citrus blast that we crave. Oranges: you’re on notice.
name: More Moro Blood Orange IPA

description:
Brewed with coriander seeds and white tea. Fruity, citrusy and bitter, with a refreshing, lingering spice.

---

Dutch seafarers returning from the east would often bring back monkeys, which they would sell to tavern-keepers to pay off drinking debts. Our IPA, with its hints of botanicals and spice, is a tribute to those sailors' spirit of adventure and quick thinking.
name: Lowlander I.P.A.

description: If you want the ultimate, you've got to be willing to pay the ultimate price. But are you crazy enough?
