Show those guys that are inching their way on the freeways in their metal coffins that the human sprit is still alive. Mosaic. Citra. Centennial. Columbus. Lots of barley. Touch of wheat. The sea swallows the Sun. And who knows if it rises again. Vaya con dios.
name: Surf Wax IPA

description:
Hops. More Hops. And then some more Hops for good measure. So hoppy, our brewers got kicked out of bed by their wives and had to sleep on the couch because they were sweating hops.
It's our double IPA, with the addition of our own Nelson Sauvin Hop Oil made from the fresh hop harvest. Which sends it nuclear. Forget about tasting anything else for the rest of the day!
name: HoppyMcHopFace - Hop Oil DIPA

description: Smooth with lots of tropical/citrus fruit notes. Juic
name: Double Crossed New England Hazy IPA

description: Huge on the Mosaic with a Hallertau Blanc back, It's All Nice features a pillowy malt body of NW Pale, 2-Row, Wheat, Oats, and Carapils and double dry hopped for a huge berry aroma balanced by sauvignon wine character.
name: It's All Nice DIPA

description: By now you know about our obsession with Miss Fancy the Elephant, but you probably don’t know that she had a very special trainer named Mr. Todd. It has been said that Miss Fancy and Mr. Todd had a special understanding and that she would not take instruction from anyone else. Mr. Todd was known for his intense affection for bootleg beer and whiskey, and being a sharing sort of bloke, he would allow Miss Fancy a few drinks as well.
name: Mr. Todd's Double IPA

description: Named after the Norse goddess Sága, drinking companion of the God Odin, this brand new beer has a divine tropical fruit hop aroma and clean, assertive bitterness. Malts: Harrington, Caramel. Hops: Centennial, Amarillo, Citra, Horizon, Rakau (dry-hopped: Amarillo, Citra, Rakau)
name: Sága IPA

description: Collaboration between Arkane Aleworks and Woodwright Brewi
name: New England Hazy IPA

description: We developed a technique called "Crop Hopping" for this heavy tropical and juicy aroma IPA, adding hops during our yeast addition. The specific whirlpool hop and multi-stage dry hop blend creates a bouquet of citrus and stone fruit in this small batch hazy IPA.
name: Yankee Stank Hazy IPA

description: Our Double IPA is intensely hopped with six hop varieties that offer a cornucopia of aromas ranging from passion fruit, peach, and pineapple to grapefruit and lemon zest. We use English Maris Otter to balance the intense hop aromas producing a malt-balanced East Coast version of a Double IPA.
name: Village Green

description: Our first beer brewed and released to the market. The IPA style was developed by the British to enable beer to survive a long voyage by ship from Britain to the colonies in India to supply the troops during the late 1700s and early 1800s. Beer usually spoiled on the trip, so a higher alcohol content and additional hops were used as natural preservatives. Our version is the American style, using a higher hopping rate than the British style, and American hops that produce citrusy and herbal/floral aromas. Moderate bitterness.
name: Hops of Wrath IPA

description: Ekuanot hops dominate bringing pine, lemon and resin notes backed up by Citra hops and Vermont yeast for a straw coloured epic beer'a'mundo!
name: Ekuanodon DIPA - Vermont Edition

description: One of the biggest and baddest IPAs we've ever made. Six hope varieties including tons of Galaxy infuse this giant IPA with flavors and aromas of pine, passion fruit, and citrus rind. Drink it fresh.
name: Unsessionable

description: Our 200th Brew! A deceptively easy drinking IPA combined with fresh pineapple chunks in the whirlpool and dry hopped with some of the sexiest new and experimental hops money can buy. A heavy hitter for bringing in the summer and our brewhouse's 2nd birthday!
name: Pineapple DIPA

description: Hop Pat
name: Hopsmack! Double IPA

description: More hops! We doubled up on the dry hop to create an IPA with an intense
name: Double Dry-Hopped 300 IPA

description: A very drinkable Imperial IPA. Pronounced but nicely balanced hop profile. A very light bodied and light colored IPA with subtle notes of orange blossom honey. Be careful - she's a sneaky one!
name: Wilma's Wandering EyePA

description: A double dry hopped, double IPA brewed and dry hopped with citrusy, tropically delicious Azacca Hops.
name: Snake Party Double IPA

description: A tropical approach to the IPA style, TripleTail weaves juicy and bodacious hops with notes of papaya, pineapple and passionfruit into this lush hop-forward IPA.
name: TripleTail

description:
Our IPA showcases a complex blend of citrus-like American hop varieties, their bitterness well-balanced by sweet malt for
exceptional drinkability.
name: Green 19 IPA

description: This Jalapeño Imperial IPA is fresh from the onset, with a quartet of bright hops playing off zesty jalapeño heat. A lustrous head retains the citrusy combination of Centennial, Sterling, Magnum and Apollo hops. Fresh jalapeños are used not only during brewing, but also after fermentation for a pleasant aroma, full-bodied flavor and genuine picante kick. A sweet bready malt backbone provides balance to the peppery fire.
name: Jalapeño Imperial IPA

description: A revisit of the last beer Josh from Cyclic brewed before leaving Partizan. We made this one with more apricot and as a result slightly stronger. Big apricot nose with a hit of Citra and Mosaic. Some apricot acidity and rich juicy mouthfeel.
name: Apricot DIPA

description: Another adventure in hop saturation and flavor, we are excited to debut this crushable monster. We have again forayed into the use of lupulin powder, which is essentially the resinous glands in hop flowers that have been separated from the plant matter. A blend of Equinox, Galaxy and Comet hops were utilized in this beer. Bright notes of mango, ripe citrus, pine, and integrated hop resin shine in both flavor and aroma. Brewed with a clean, yet supportive malt bill of Pilsner, wheat, and flaked wheat. You will notice and imminently smooth mouthfeel, making this beer dangerously drinkable. Let our DIPA take you to outer space!
name: Space Time Surfboard DIPA

description: Version 3.0 of Hi-Wire's popular HazyJuicyHoppyFresh IPA series. Features Azacca, Mosaic and Amarillo hops with a slime green and black stripes on white can.
name: Hazy & Juicy & Hoppy & Fresh IPA 3.0
